Module it.polimi.ingsw.GC24
Package view.screens

Class GodSelectionScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.screens.Screen
      • view.screens.GodSelectionScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameObserver, TurnObserver, MessageTarget, Observer, View
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CLIGodSelectionScreen, GUIGodSelection
    public abstract class GodSelectionScreen
extends Screen
    This screen should display all the choosable gods of the game The first player can select two or three gods (according to the number of players) then he can submit the choices and move the game to the PickGodScreen

      • GodSelectionScreen

        public GodSelectionScreen​(ViewManager view,
                          java.lang.String activePlayer)
        Creates a new instance of GodSelectionScreen
        Parameters:
        view - The view manager of the screen
        activePlayer - The username of the active player

    • Method Detail

      • getChosenGodList

        protected final java.util.List<java.lang.String> getChosenGodList()
        Returns:
        A list with the gods chosen from the player, if the players chooses mortal, a list containing a number of "Mortal" equals to the number of players will be returned (for compatibility with the model)

      • isGodChosen

        protected final boolean isGodChosen​(java.lang.String god)
        Parameters:
        god - The god to search in the set of chosen gods
        Returns:
        true if the god is in the chosen list

      • readyToSubmit

        protected final boolean readyToSubmit()
        Checks if the number of god chosen from the user is correct, so the player could submit the choice to the server
        Returns:
        True if the number of god chosen from the user is correct

      • addGod

        protected final void addGod​(java.lang.String name)
                     throws IllegalValueException,
                            IllegalActionException
        Adds a god in the list of god chosen if there is space
        Parameters:
        name - The name identifier of the god to add
        Throws:
        IllegalValueException - The identifier of the god is not valid
        IllegalActionException - The set of gods is full because the number of gods chosen is equal to the number of the players or if a mortal is in the list.
        ActivityNotAllowedException - It's not up to this Player to choose the gods.

      • removeGod

        protected final void removeGod​(java.lang.String name)
                        throws IllegalValueException,
                               IllegalActionException
        Remove an chosen god from the chosen god list
        Parameters:
        name - The string identifier of the god to be removed
        Throws:
        IllegalValueException - The identifier of the god is not valid
        IllegalActionException - The set of chosen gods is empty
        ActivityNotAllowedException - It's not up to this Player to choose the gods.

      • submitGodList

        protected final void submitGodList()
                            throws IllegalActionException
        Submits chosen god list to the server, sending a message trough the network
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - The list of god is not already suitable for submitting it to the server
        ActivityNotAllowedException - The screen is not active

      • receiveGameState

        Specified by:
        receivePlayerList in interface GameObserver
        Overrides:
        receivePlayerList in class Screen
        Parameters:
        player - A map with keys all player names and values the name of the god pick from other players, if the player has not picked a god the value will be null
